text: Edelweiss is a well-known Europe mountain flower. == Description == Leaves and flowers are covered with white hairs and look woolly. Each Edelweiss bloom has five to six small yellow flower heads surrounded by leaflets in a star shape. The flowers are in bloom between July and September. == Range == The Edelweiss prefers rocky limestone places. It has been used traditionally in folk medicine. The hair on the flower protect the Edelweiss from cold. == References == Category:Asteraceae Category:Flowers
title: Edelweiss
